GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

/api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with specified article_id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of the comment for a specific article by article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments votes property for a given article by id and serves the updated article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: post a comment to an article of given article_id and serves the new comment
